SELECT DISTINCT(T.TASK_NO),T2.ORDER_NO,T.IO_TYPE,T.SLOC_NO,T.ELOC_NO,T.PALLET_NO,T.TASK_EXEC_START_DT,T.TASK_EXEC_END_DT FROM Z50_WBS_TASK T JOIN Z50_WBS_TASK_CMD T1 ON T1.TASK_GUID = T.TASK_GUID LEFT JOIN WBS_ORDER_LINE T2 ON T.ORDER_LINE_GUID = T2.ORDER_LINE_GUID
T.TASK_NO like '%'||#where.TASK_NO#||'%'
T2.ORDER_NO like '%'||#where.ORDER_NO#||'%'
T.IO_TYPE like '%'||#where.IO_TYPE#||'%'
T.SLOC_NO like '%'||#where.SLOC_NO#||'%'
T.ELOC_NO like '%'||#where.ELOC_NO#||'%'
T.PALLET_NO like '%'||#where.PALLET_NO#||'%'
T.TASK_EXEC_START_DT >=#where.TASK_EXEC_START_DT#
T.TASK_EXEC_END_DT <= 1+#where.TASK_EXEC_END_DT#
AND T.SLOC_NO IS NOT NULL AND T.ELOC_NO IS NOT NULL AND T.TASK_EXEC_START_DT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY T.TASK_EXEC_START_DT DESC,T.TASK_NO DESC
